title: The Get Together: NYC Lineup (m ss ng p eces)
description:
Music Connects.
The Get Together presented by House of Marley
Watch the entire experience at:
http://www.thehouseofmarley.com/get-t...

Meet House of Marley's new portable bluetooth speaker:
The Get Together.
Four acclaimed motion studios each created a video about
the Get Together speaker system. We centered on two locations: Kingston, Jamaica and New York City, and shot two videos in each city. The idea was simple: How one speaker can bring everything together - friends, cities, even style eras.

Rocksteady & Freestyle. New Jack & Riddim. Mods & Rockers.
Music connects us all.
____________________________

m ss ng p eces Production Credits:

Sam Fleischner - Director
Cynsei Sohbet - Dancer/Choreographer 
Milos Jacimovic - Camera
Ethan Palmer - 2nd Camera
Deidre Schoo - Producer 
Sarah Lasley - Post effects
Secret Circuit - Music
Matt Boynton (Vacation Island Recording) - Sound Mix
